CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Butterfly Network Inc is an innovative digital health company. It is working towards democratizing medical imaging by making it accessible to everyone around the world and contribute to the aspiration of global health equity. The company has developed a groundbreaking single-probe, whole-body point-of-care ultrasound solution leveraging technology.
